name: opsrvsca
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0

stmt.origin: opsrbaslem(cvsca, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, nat6, w0)
stmt.pretty: opsrbaslem(cvsca, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, nat6, w0)

|- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvsca, c0), cfv(cvsca, c1)))

-| wceq(cvsca, cslot(nat6))
-| wcel(nat6, cn)
-| wbr(nat6, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

comment: The scalar product operation of the ordered power series structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)
